{{Location Intro|description=<p>A hidden area in the [[Night Kingdom]] resembling the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]]. It can be unlocked using the {{Item|Night Jade}} item.</p>}}

After obtaining the Night Jade, the Chamber of Night's Trial can be accessed at a location south of the Stadium of Sacred Flames.

Speak with the [[Nightsoul Spirit]] to participate in a challenge against eight "Nightsoul warriors." Defeating them within 60 seconds unlocks two Luxurious [[Chest]]s, two Exquisite Chests, and a Precious Chest; and awards the {{Achievement|By Battle Be Settled...}}
